author: Simon Difford
description: Champagne replaces Bourgogne Aligoté white wine in this 'Royal' rendition of Mayor Canon Kir's classic apéritif. Easy to make, easy to drink.
name: Kir Royale
recipeIngredient: 120 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: POUR cassis into glass and TOP with champagne
